lead_paragraph: GOODMAN--Carol A.,Beloved wife for 60 years of the late Daniel R. Goodman, passed away peacefully at home on January 26, 2016. She is survived by her children, Robert and Kenneth Goodman, Barbara G. Pommer and husband, Russ, and grandchildren, Stacy, Zachary, Tyler and Jacob. Services took place at Temple Beth El 333 SW 4th Ave., Boca Raton, FL on January 29, 2016. Please send donations to the Alzheimer's Association (www.ALZ.org) 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOODMAN, CAROL A.
